name: Alone With You (itch) (alexeyizimov)
description:
Rei's high school life was a failure - he never made a single friend in three years. But suddenly, three months before his graduation, life gives him a chance to change everything, to brighten up the last months of school. But will he accept this gift of fate?

10 BGs, 10 CGs, live2d sprites and voice-over (for now - only in Russian) for every heroine!
Game will be published in AppStore, Google Play, Steam and EPG (and here we have versions for Android, Windows and Linux). 

Mac version will be in the next week
